description:
This delightful and contemporary Plantation-built home sits proudly on an elevated 576m2 block in a tranquil pocket of Yarrabilba. It is merely a stone's throw away from schools, shops, parklands and other popular amenities and is surrounded by other quality builds in a desirable and family-friendly neighborhood.

This amazing home presents with sleek architectural lines and a neutral colour palette, creating a modern, warm and inviting atmosphere. It showcases a unique and palatial floor plan which spans one large, single level of living. 3 separate living spaces are on offer, including an inviting formal lounge room which is a spacious and elegant location designed for entertaining guests and perfect for those late-night movie marathons. Additionally, the home features a private teenager's retreat, distanced from the main living quarters, as well as an open plan living and dining space.

The kitchen lies at the heart of the home and is a striking space for the gourmet chef within. It features expansive and sparkling stone benchtops, premium stainless-steel appliances including a Technika 900mm gas top and integrated electric oven, a stunning glass splashback, sleek canopy rangehood, convenient walk-in pantry and a plethora of cupboard storage.

The kitchen overlooks an air-conditioned, open plan living and dining area which flows seamlessly into the stunning, covered alfresco space. This is an attractive space which is the perfect precinct for entertaining guests, hosting family gatherings or simply enjoying the great outdoors. This area overlooks a low maintenance yard which showcases lush, yet low maintenance tropical landscaping in a serene and peaceful setting.

This lovely residence boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, all with built-in robes and ceiling fans for your utmost comfort during the warmer months. The master suite is colossal in size and features a large walk-in robe and expansive sliding doors that lead you to your own private gated oasis outside. The room also showcases a luxurious ensuite with dual stone vanities, designer tapware and a double shower. The main bathroom is equally as impressive in style and function and showcases a bathtub and premium tapware and fittings and services the remaining bedrooms.

This residence is immaculately presented and within close proximity to schools, shops, community centres, cafes and a plethora of popular parks including the famed Darlington Parklands which features an amazing free waterpark, climbing domes, an outdoor gym, flying fox and shaded picnic areas, amongst many other features. Conveniently located between Brisbane and the Gold Coast, Yarrabilba is a booming and vibrant community that is expanding in development by the day. Inspect this great property and experience the best of contemporary, active living in this amazing neck of the woods.

PROPERTY FEATURES AND INCLUSIONS:
- Stunning lowset home set on a 576m2 block
- Built in 2017 by Plantation Homes
- Floor plan size approx 282m2
- 4 spacious bedrooms, all with BIR and fans
- Master suite showcases large WIR and ensuite
- 2 contemporary bathrooms
- 3 separate living areas including:
- Open plan living and dining
- Formal lounge/media
- Children's retreat
- Stunning gourmet kitchen which features:
- Expansive stone benchtops
- 900mm premium Technika gas cooktop
- Premium stainless-steel appliances
- Soft-close drawers
- Dual sink with flexi basin mixer
- Large walk-in pantry
- Ample cupboard and pantry storage
- Separate internal laundry
- Timber laminate flooring in all living areas
- Lush carpets in bedrooms and formal lounge
- Recessed lighting
- Block-out indoor blinds
- Split system air-conditioning
- 7.5m x 7.5m outdoor entertaining area
- Attractive, rendered front façade
- Low maintenance tropical landscaping
- Double remote garage
- Garden shed ( 3m x 3m x 2.1)
- Fully fenced
- Council rates approx $930/qtr inc water


'Disclaimer:
All information provided has been obtained from sources we believe to be accurate, however, we cannot guarantee the information is accurate and we accept no liability for any errors or omissions (including but not limited to a property's land size, floor plans and size, building age and condition) Interested parties should make their own enquiries and obtain their own legal advice.
